entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High zero.
